Too fantastic!Strike combos; Pop colorful blocks...Get ready to BLAST in Puzzle FamilyVS!Amazing characters appear from Puzzle Family, this time with more high-quality 3D graphics!Play along with your friends, family, and puzzle rivals in this ultimate puzzle battle!â â â  Game Features â â â 1) Real-time Online MatchesBattle against worldwide puzzle manias!Attack and defend with blocks and items, show the world what you can do!But, wait!Don't forget, this is a game...you know it's not about 'player kill,' right?2) Single PlayGet rid of bad items, get higher scores!Accomplish various missions; Your skills UP, scores UP, and fun UP!Exciting fever modes gets you twice your points!Play alone, and play with friends, play with worldwide puzzle manias to see who's got the higher score. reviews.title: CRAZY!

reviews.title: more puzzles and etc.
reviews.comment: this game is awsome.please make some puzzle games,a plot (to understand the game),   more charaters,costumes,and offline multuplayer. thank you  p.s. akoos charater design is really great   p.s.
reviews.author: Rosh Hashana

reviews.title: won\'t load! fix it!
reviews.comment: it worked perfectly fine until I got the galaxy note 2... FIX THE BUG!!! we\'re all begging to play puzzle family versus for so long! ! :C
reviews.author: Mimi derpwon\'ttellyou

reviews.title: Wont ever get passed the loading page
reviews.comment: Every time I open it, it\'ll never get passed the spinning loading page with the Characters leaping across. Pleaaaaaase fix ! I played this on my friend\'s ipad mini and it\'s so much fun !
reviews.author: Lorraine Gillego

reviews.title: Can\'t be played - loading all time
reviews.comment: Everytime I open the game,it won\'t start, it only shows all characters jumping arounds n the blue circle keeps turning n will never stopped. Can\'t exit from the app too..so,I had to force close the app from home button,then forced to end this running game..please fix it..I want to play this game so badly
reviews.author: Fenny Yuniati Yudy

reviews.title: Cant play!
reviews.comment: Stuck in the title page! Im using gnote 8 btw

reviews.title: PuzzleFamily?
reviews.comment: This game never starts! It just loads And i watched the little characters jump around for 10 minuets:( i want to play this game badly!

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Stuck on the circular loading screen either when I am connected to internet or not.  Please fixed  bugs ASAP..  this is not a minor one.
